publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2935 Pauline McNeill: Colourfest 2002—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that Scotland’s biggest dance music festival, Colourfest 2002, is to be held in Glasgow on 2 June 2002 with Radio One, Clyde 1 and world class DJs and performers from around the UK and Europe bringing 10,000 young people to the city venue.

S1M-2935 Pauline McNeill: Colourfest 2002—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that Scotland’s biggest dance music festival, Colourfest 2002, is to be held in Glasgow on 2 June 2002 with Radio One, Clyde 1 and world class DJs and performers from around the UK and Europe bringing 10,000 young people to the city venue. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2935 Colourfest 2002 (lodged on 25 March 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2935 Colourfest 2002 (lodged on 25 March 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-2935 Colourfest 2002 (lodged on 25 March 2002) Janis Hughes*
